author: nick.ghita
content: Hey guys, bit of a scheduling snafu on my end, so I won't be able to make the sync. Short update from me, I'm back from time off and jumped back into merkle trie implementation in trin - hope to have a pr up asap

author: acolytec3
content: Since I think I heard <@!783601578779082753> mention it in the call this morning, a general question for trin/fluffy devs, are either of you looking to support other transport mechanisms than straight UDP?  I'm exploring how to add websocket support to the JS discv5 library so we could conceptually run Ultralight in the browser so was curious if any other clients would be able to support connections.  I could always set up a relay node that sends browser based node requests out to the broader network but it adds a central point of failure back in that we are hoping to avoid
